main event: Two high school students reported seeing a large, luminous egg-shaped object hovering over a field near Dalton, Massachusetts, on November 8, 1966.
interesting points: The object was about 60 feet in diameter and surrounded by a glowing aura,The students observed the object hovering silently for several minutes before it shot straight up and disappeared,The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes before the students reported it to their parents,The initial investigation leaned towards a hoax, but further analysis raised doubts about this conclusion,The case has drawn attention due to similar reports in the area and the actions of the object being deemed deliberate.
witness description: two high school students, a boy and a girl
